  • {field_*****} - Any field value submitted by the user
  • {option_admin_email} - E-mail address of blog administrator
  • {option_blogname} - Weblog title; set in General Options
  • {option_blogdescription} - Tagline for your blog; set in General Options
  • {option_blog_charset} - Blog Charset
  • {option_date_format} - Date Format
  • {option_default_category} - Default post category; set in Writing Options
  • {option_home} - The blog's home web address; set in General Options
  • {option_siteurl} - WordPress web address; set in General Options
  • {option_template} - The current theme's name; set in Presentation
  • {option_start_of_week} - Start of the week
  • {option_upload_path} - Default upload location; set in Miscellaneous Options
  • {option_posts_per_page} - Posts per page
  • {option_posts_per_rss} - Posts per RSS feed
  • {real_ip} - Retrieves the submitter's IP address
  • {loop_label} - Retrieves the field label for the field loop {loop_fields}
  • {loop_value} - Retrieves the field value for the field loop {loop_fields}
  • {loop_fields} - Retrieves the loop anywhere in your email
  • {post_title} - Retreives the current page or post title
  • {post_id} - Retreives the current page or post ID
  • {user_login} - Retreives the current logged in user login (username)
  • {user_email} - Retreives the current logged in user email
  • {user_firstname} - Retreives the current logged in user first name
  • {user_lastname} - Retreives the current logged in user last name
  • {user_display} - Retreives the current logged in user display name
  • {user_id} - Retreives the current logged in user ID
","conditional_action":"disabled","conditional_trigger":"all","conditional_items":[{"field":"post_title","logic":"contains","value":""}]}}]
